name: PeRSSe
short_description: PeRSSe is a package of Perl classes representing components of RSS feed (channels, items, fields). PeRSSe can be used for manipulating RSS feeds. PeRSSe has support for object persistance using databases. Few tools like rss, mail2rss are also included.
